page.title: 04Rogart - Food
page.content: The most popular food items in Rogart are mince and potatoes, milk and bread. Many people buy convenience foods like Heinz beans. In the winter people eat hot meats like sausages, porridge, stew and soup. In the summer, people eat salads and cold meals. Sadly, big stores are replacing smaller shops. The favourite meal in Rogart is broth followed by mince and potatoes. Broth is a soup full of carrots, onions, cabbage, leeks, turnip, barley and any other available vegetables. Mince is minced beef braised in a pan with onions and carrots. Potatoes are boiled; definitely not chipped. This dish is at its best when potatoes and mince are mashed together.
